title: Podcast: Impressions from Preseason Game 1
text:
SALT LAKE CITY Â— Yes, it's just one game. And yes, it's just preseason. But there are still plenty of takeaways and impressions to be had after the Jazz's first game of the 2015-16 season. 
Host Andy Larsen breaks down the first game of the 2015-16 preseason for the Utah Jazz. The big topic: should Raul Neto start? That, plus 10 other impressions from the Jazz's first game back in action. 
The KSL Court Report is a new 20-minute podcast on KSL.com, hosted by Utah Jazz beat writer Andy Larsen. The podcast is designed to fit into the average commute while still fitting in quality analysis on the Jazz topic of the day. 
You can listen to the podcast below, and subscribe on your mobile device on iTunes or Stitcher Radio
